synsets.definition: Deep emotional bonds within family characterized by unconditional loyalty, sacrifice, and interdependence that extends beyond Western nuclear family concepts to include complex generational obligations and spiritual connections
synsets.cultural_note: Chinese concept emphasizing family bonds as foundational to identity, involving emotional, material, and spiritual reciprocity across generations

synsets.definition: Intimate connection where hearts, minds, and spirits unite in complete understanding, representing the deepest form of human bond that transcends verbal communication
synsets.cultural_note: Japanese concept integrating emotional, intellectual, and spiritual intimacy as a unified whole, deeper than Western emotional intimacy

synsets.definition: Profound emotional attachment that develops through shared experiences, creating unbreakable bonds of mutual care, loyalty, and intuitive understanding
synsets.cultural_note: Korean concept of deep affection that builds over time, creating family-like bonds even among non-relatives through emotional investment

synsets.definition: Pure, selfless love that transcends physical attraction, encompassing spiritual union and complete devotion characterized by surrender of ego and universal compassion
synsets.cultural_note: Sanskrit/Hindi concept of love as spiritual practice, representing the highest form of intimate connection that includes divine consciousness

synsets.definition: Selfless love characterized by complete empathy, nurturing care, and spiritual connection that flows naturally without expectation of reciprocation
synsets.cultural_note: Tamil concept emphasizing love as natural compassion that creates intimate bonds through selfless care and spiritual recognition

synsets.definition: Intimate generosity of spirit where one offers help, kindness, and emotional support spontaneously, creating bonds through mutual care and understanding
synsets.cultural_note: Thai concept of fluid, generous heart that creates intimate social bonds through spontaneous acts of kindness and emotional availability

synsets.definition: Deep spiritual and emotional intimacy where souls connect at the innermost level, characterized by complete transparency and spiritual unity
synsets.cultural_note: Indonesian/Javanese concept of intimate connection at the deepest spiritual level, involving complete emotional and spiritual transparency

synsets.definition: Gentle, enduring love characterized by tenderness, mercy, and deep emotional intimacy that grows stronger through shared spiritual and life experiences
synsets.cultural_note: Arabic concept of tender, merciful love that creates intimate bonds through shared spiritual growth and mutual compassion

synsets.definition: Intense spiritual and emotional love that transcends the physical realm, creating profound intimacy through complete devotion and mystical union
synsets.cultural_note: Persian concept of transformative love that creates ultimate intimacy through spiritual devotion and mystical consciousness

synsets.definition: Deep love and intimate connection with fellow community members characterized by mutual responsibility, spiritual kinship, and shared covenant
synsets.cultural_note: Jewish concept of intimate communal love based on shared spiritual destiny and mutual responsibility for each other's wellbeing

synsets.definition: Pure, unconditional love that creates intimate bonds through complete acceptance, forgiveness, and spiritual recognition of shared humanity
synsets.cultural_note: Swahili concept emphasizing love as spiritual recognition that creates intimate connections through unconditional acceptance

synsets.definition: Sacred love that connects souls through spiritual recognition, creating intimate bonds blessed by ancestral wisdom and divine energy
synsets.cultural_note: Yoruba concept of love as sacred force connecting people through spiritual recognition and ancestral blessing

synsets.definition: Pure heart condition that creates intimate connections through spiritual generosity, emotional authenticity, and sacred reciprocity with all beings
synsets.cultural_note: Lakota concept of heart purity that creates intimate connections through spiritual authenticity and sacred relationship with all life

synsets.definition: Profound intimate connection achieved through silent, spiritual listening that allows complete presence and deep understanding without words
synsets.cultural_note: Aboriginal Australian concept of creating intimate bonds through deep spiritual listening and complete presence with others

synsets.definition: Bittersweet longing that creates intimate connection through shared nostalgia, deep appreciation for relationships, and profound emotional presence
synsets.cultural_note: Portuguese/Brazilian concept where longing itself creates intimacy through deep appreciation and emotional connection

synsets.definition: Sacred life force that creates intimate spiritual connections between people through shared divine essence and reciprocal energy exchange
synsets.cultural_note: Nahuatl concept of divine energy that creates intimate bonds through recognition of shared sacred essence

synsets.definition: Deep love infused with reverence and spiritual protection, creating intimate bonds characterized by both tenderness and sacred duty
synsets.cultural_note: Mongolian concept combining intimate love with spiritual reverence and protective devotion

synsets.definition: Boundless loving-kindness that creates intimate spiritual connections through compassionate presence and wish for others' happiness
synsets.cultural_note: Tibetan Buddhist concept of love as spiritual practice creating intimate bonds through compassionate presence

synsets.definition: Deep familial intimacy that extends beyond blood relations to include chosen family, characterized by unconditional loyalty and mutual support
synsets.cultural_note: Filipino concept of family-like intimacy that can be extended to non-relatives through deep emotional bonds and loyalty

synsets.definition: Profound love that encompasses spiritual, emotional, and communal dimensions, creating intimate bonds blessed by divine grace and ancestral wisdom
synsets.cultural_note: Ethiopian Amharic concept of love incorporating spiritual blessing and ancestral wisdom in intimate relationships

synsets.definition: Tender, nurturing love that creates intimate connections through gentle care, emotional protection, and spiritual reciprocity with nature and community
synsets.cultural_note: Quechua concept of nurturing love that creates intimacy through gentle protection and spiritual connection with community

synsets.definition: Warm, oily love that lubricates relationships, creating smooth intimate connections characterized by emotional nourishment and spiritual bonding
synsets.cultural_note: Sanskrit concept using the metaphor of oil to describe love that nourishes and smooths intimate relationships

synsets.definition: Sacred breath of life shared between people, creating intimate spiritual connection through recognition of divine presence in each other
synsets.cultural_note: Hawaiian concept of love as sacred life force creating intimate spiritual connections through shared divine breath

synsets.definition: Deep love encompassing compassion, empathy, and spiritual connection that creates intimate bonds through shared whakapapa (genealogy) and mauri (life force)
synsets.cultural_note: Māori concept of love incorporating spiritual genealogy and life force in creating intimate connections

synsets.definition: Deep soul-to-soul intimacy characterized by complete emotional transparency, spiritual communion, and profound mutual understanding transcending words
synsets.cultural_note: Russian concept of intimate soul connection involving complete emotional openness and spiritual communion
